Elita:

Elita was getting tired and yawed.




--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> Yggdrasil: Rodimus, my idea is very touchy. I want you to know it
> before it gets any further.
> 
> *************************
> 
> On the other side of the planet, AzureBlade was glad he finally
> received an answer.
> 
> AzureBlade: Greetings, Master Kup. Speaking with such a famous bot 
is
> an honour. Can you send the coordinates of your base so I might 
better
> get there?
> 
> He transformed to dragon-jet mode. He was a transmetal bot and his
> climatic adaptation made him only slicker. In his present mode, he
> looked like a jet fighter covered with icicles. The nose section,
> however, was mounted at the end of a long metallic neck and 
consisted
> of a ice blue dragon head.
> 
> He started circling above the frozen mass on which he had landed 
and
> fought the wind to remain airborne. Soon, he would leave this 
place.
> 
> Soon, he would start looking for Prime.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> 
wrote:
> > : : Rodimus Prime : :
> > Rodimus nods at the group.
> > 
> > Rodimus Prime: I'm glad I have a top notch team hre to come up 
with
> this stuff. Do we have any insurence that it will work though?
> > 
> > Rodimus was tickling and making faces at Elita at this time, 
making
> planning things with him kind of odd.
> > 
> > Rodimus gets Windlord's forwarded message, and sends it to Kup.
> > 
> > : : Kup : :
> > 
> > Kup: Hello AzureBlade. I am Kup, Security Chief of the local 
Maximal
> forces. We welcome you to come to our base.
> > 
> > 
> > Nic <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:Yggdrasil raises an eyebrow.
> > 
> > yggdrasil: That could be a basis, and combined with Kenzo's virus
> > detector, it could well work. However, we could do something 
more to
> > throw the Preds off guard...
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> 
wrote:
> > > : : Rodimus Prime : :
> > > Rodimus took his daughter into his arms, before answering the
> > question of the Iron Squad Commander.
> > > 
> > > Rodimus Prime: Well when Nightlight and I...
> > > 
> > > He pauses and he forces himself to talk about this publicly.
> > > 
> > > Rodimus Prime: When we were "together" the programming of our 
sparks
> > was merged to form the core spark for Elita here. This means 
that a
> > cop file of the programming from Nightlight's spark is within 
me, and
> > I in her as well. If we were connected with a computer running 
file
> > transfers between us, we could upload the old programming to her
> > spark. I believe that this would overcome the predacon 
programming.
> > > 
> > > 
> > > Nic <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:The Iron Squad commander looked 
at
> > his colleague quizzically. He hoped
> > > Rodimus felt better and acted better.
> > > 
> > > Yggdrasil: What do you mean, Rod? Tell us more...
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen 
<roborick007@y...> wrote:
> > > > : : Rodimus Prime/Kup : : Rodimus comes out of the CR and 
locates
> > > Kup and Yaggdrasil. He comes in as they are discussing how to 
fix
> > > Nightlight's programming. Rodimus Prime: I think I know how we 
can fix
> > > that. It's only theory, but may be our best chance. Kup looks 
at
> > > Rodimus, an eyebrowl raised.
> > > >
